example.eg: Grab the axe by the handle and swing.
He turned the handle to open the door.
Can you handle all the plates, or should I help you?
example.egtrans: 你能搬运所有盘子吗，还是我来帮你？

example.eg: Don't handle that vase.  You might drop it.
example.egtrans: 不要去动那个花瓶，省得打碎了。

example.eg: I like to handle a fabric for some time before I buy it.
example.egtrans: 在购买布料之前，我一般先要好好摸一摸。

example.eg: She handled all the finances for the family.
example.egtrans: 她管理家庭的全部财务。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处理, 操纵, 管理

example.eg: He couldn't handle the emotional effect of his father's death.
example.egtrans: 他在感情上应付不了自己父亲的死。

example.eg: This shop only handles designer furniture.
example.egtrans: 这家商店只经销设计师家具。

example.eg: His short wave radio handle was MadMax.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 化名, 代号, 别号

example.eg: The track handle last Friday was more than $5 million.
Our new car handles well on these twisty mountain roads.
example.egtrans: 我们的新车在这些弯弯曲曲的山道上表现良好。

example.eg: This magazine handles current issues in education.
The politician handled the difficult question by not answering it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 应对, 处理, 响应

example.eg: Attach the broom handle to the broom head.
Don't kick the door open - use the door handle!
My dad flew off the handle when I told him I'd crashed the car.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发火, 失去控制, 失去常态

dsense.name: get a handle on [sth], have a handle on

example.eg: I can't get a handle on this at all.  Can you explain it again?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 理解, 了解, 小心轻放...

dsense.name: handle [sth/sb] with kid gloves, treat [sth/sb] with kid gloves

example.eg: He's having a rough day so you'd better handle him with kid gloves.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小心处理, 温和对待
